GSP33yaissi_u:4: tatra mīmāṃsakāḥ prāhuḥ - nāyaṃ sarvārthadarśanaśaktisampannaḥ puruṣo 'bhyupagamamarhati,
GSP33yaissi_u:11: bhaktyā dhyānābhyāsāt prakaṭaḥ prajñāṃ tanotu me śubhrām // 2 //
GSP33yaissi_u:12: atha khalu tatrabhavān paramācāryaḥ śrīmadbhagavadyāmunamunirātmacintāṃ vidhāyātmasiddhau
GSP33yaissi_u:15: samastamaṃ cetanācatanātmakaṃ jagat ekasya - sarveśvarasya vaśe - icchāyāṃ saṅkalpalakṣaṇāyāṃ pravartateprakarṣeṇa vartate - asaṅkīrṇasvarūpasvabhāvavyavasthamāste,
GSP33yaissi_u:16: pravartate ca sve sve karmaṇi yathāyathamiti kṛtsnasya sarveśvarasaṅkalpādhīnasvarūpasthitipravṛttikatvaṃ sādhayituṃ - pramāṇato vyavasthāpayituṃ,
GSP33yaissi_u:22: sarvārthadarśanaśaktiśālinamavagamayatā hi deśakālasvabhāvaviprakarṣavyavadhānajuṣaḥ sarva evārthāstaddarśanaṃ śaktiśca gocarayitavyāni /
GSP33yaissi_u:23: na ca vidyamānendriyasannikarṣayogyakatipayaviṣayanipatavṛtterlaukikapratyakṣasya niravadhirayaṃ mahimā saṃbhāvanābhūmiriti kathamiva tadiha sādhanamiti manyemahi/
GSP33yaissi_u:24: 'nāyam' iti / sarvārthasākṣātkakārasarvakāryopajananaśakti sampannaścetanaviśeṣa īśvaraśabditaḥ sādhakābhāvādbādhakabalācca nāṅgīkartuṃ yogya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:26: atipatitā - apakrāntā sakalasādhakapramāṇasambhāvanā yasyāḥ evambhūtā bhūmirviṣayaḥ,
GSP33yaissi_u:28: atra iti 'atipatitasakalasādhakapramāṇasaṃbhāvanābhūmitvatvā' diti 'atipatitasakala sādhakapramāṇasaṃbhāvanābhūmitvatvā'diti vā pāṭhaḥ sambhāvyate
GSP33yaissi_u:42: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - cākṣuṣasya tāvat pratyakṣasya rūparūpirūpaikārthasamavetasaṅkhyādaya eva viṣayāḥ,
GSP33yaissi_u:44: udbhūtānabhibhūtameva rūpaṃ mahattvaikādhikaraṇaṃ grāhyaṃ na tu paramāṇvādigatamiti tatrāpi vyavasthitatā /
GSP33yaissi_u:48: sarvārthasya tadgrahaṇasya tacchakteśca grahaṇamantarā ca na tasya grahaṇaṃ ghaṭate /
GSP33yaissi_u:50: jñānasya bahirindriyāgrāhyatvādvāhyārthānāṃ ca kevalena manasāgrahānnendriyeṇa kenāpi sarvārthādergrahaṇam /
GSP33yaissi_u:68: arthasannikarṣasahakārīṇi bahirindriyāṇi jñānajananānīti tānyapi nātīte 'nāgate vār'the jñānaṃ janayantīti na tadupajanitaṃ pratyakṣaṃ yathoktaviṣayaniyamamatikrāmati
GSP33yaissi_u:71: bāhyaviṣayamitiṣu ca manaso niraṅkuśakaraṇatāṅgīkāre hi kṛtaṃ cakṣurādibhiḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:72: ataśca na kaścidandho badhiro vā bhavet /
GSP33yaissi_u:73: bhavati cātra - vimatipadaṃ mano bahirindriyanirapekṣaṃ na bāhyapratyakṣagocare pravartate,
GSP33yaissi_u:75: yadyatra yattantravṛtti na tattannirapekṣaṃ tatra pravartate,
GSP33yaissi_u:80: na khalu suprayuktabheṣajaśatavihitasaṃskāramapi śrotraṃ rūparasavibhāgāvagamāya kalpate /
GSP33yaissi_u:88: atikrāmato vā kutaḥ pratkṣatvamiti na viśvānubhavaiśvaryaśālini pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam /
GSP33yaissi_u:95: naca sarvārthanirmāṇasākṣātkārapaṭīyasi liṅgaṃ sāmānyatodṛṣṭamapi kiñcana labhyate/
GSP33yaissi_u:104: sarvārtheṣvevambhūtā api padārthāḥ praviṣṭā iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:133: iha cāntyāvayavibhyaḥ prabhṛti ādvyaṇukakamakhilamavayavikramanihīyamānanānāvayavavyatiṣaṅgaviśeṣajanitamavagatam ityantata upādānaṃ caturvidhāḥ paramāṇavaḥ prapañcasya /
GSP33yaissi_u:137: na cāmī svasamavāyināvapi dharmādharmāvalamavalokayitumiti tadatirekī nikhilabhuvananirmāṇa
GSP33yaissi_u:176: atha tasya manomātrajanyatve 'pi na tatpramāṇatvaṃ sarvārthadyagrāhakatvādevetyāha ' nāpyāntare' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:180: manasaḥ sākṣādeva bāhyārthagrāhakatve doṣamāha ' niraṅkuśe' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:182: evaṃ manasi hetumupapādya sādhyaṃ prayogamukhataḥ sādhayati ' bhavatī ' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:206: cakṣuṣo hi svābhāvikaṃ sāmarthyaṃ rūparūpyādigrahaṇa eva,
GSP33yaissi_u:207: na tu yogādināpi rasādigrahaṇe sāmarthyaṃ tasya saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:208: tathāca pāṭavātiśayāddhavīyo 'pi sūkṣmatamaṃ rūpaṃ gṛhṇātu nāma yogicakṣuḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:212: maryādā ca cakṣuṣo rūpādiṣu caturṣu rūpasyaiva grāhakatvamiti /
GSP33yaissi_u:217: evamaindriyikatve yogijñānasya sarvārthādyagrāhakatvamupapādyānaindriyikatve 'pi tasya yathātvamata eveśvare pramāṇatvāsaṃbhavaṃ copapādayati ' bhāvane ' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:225: samuditāśayastvayam - anubhūtasya paunaḥpunyena smṛtyabhyāsena saṃskārapracayaḥ saṃpadyate /
GSP33yaissi_u:226: tatparyante smṛtyabhyāse sati jāyamānā smṛtirevapratyakṣavadviśadaviṣayāvabhāsā bhavatīti pratyakṣasamānākāraṃ smaraṇameva cedyogipratyakṣaṃ vivakṣitam ,
GSP33yaissi_u:230: ata eva pramāṇaviśeṣapratyakṣarūpatvaṃ tasya na tarāṃ
GSP33yaissi_u:236: sarvasākṣātkartari sarvakartari sarvaniyantari ceśvare 'smadādīnāṃ yogināṃ vendriyarūpaṃ pratyakṣaṃ na pramāṇaṃ - na pramitijanakamityarthaḥ
GSP33yaissi_u:237: nanu kevalasya bahirasvātantrye 'pi yogajaprakṛṣṭādṛṣṭasahakṛtasya tasya bāhyeṣvatīndriyeṣu traikālikeṣu cārtheṣu pravṛttiḥ saṃbhavennāma /
GSP33yaissi_u:238: tat prakṛṣṭādṛṣṭasahakṛtamanojanyameva pratyakṣaṃ yogināṃ syādīśvare pramāṇam /
GSP33yaissi_u:243: etena paramātmadhyānajanitameva paramātmaviṣayamānasapratyatraṃ pramāṇaṃ tasminnityapi nirastam /
GSP33yaissi_u:244: paramātmano dhyānaṃ hi tajjñānamantarā na saṃbhavati /
GSP33yaissi_u:246: śāstrasya ca kāryaparasya na tatra tātparyam /
GSP33yaissi_u:247: śrutipauruṣeyatvanaye punaranyonyasaṃśrayaḥ spaṣṭa eva īśvarasiddhau taduktatvācchāstraprāmāṇyasiddhiḥ,
GSP33yaissi_u:249: anumānaṃ ca na pramāṇaṃ tatretyanantarameva vakṣyate /
GSP33yaissi_u:251: evaṃ laukikayaugikabhedena dvividhasya pratyakṣasyeśvare na pramāṇatvamityuktam /
GSP33yaissi_u:252: kimasya tasminnāyattaṃ kiṃ nu janmāthavā sthitiḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:256: bhavati hi taducitādṛṣṭaśālināṃ sarveṣāmeva teṣāṃ taddehina iva tadutpattisthitinimittatvam /
GSP33yaissi_u:257: api ca śarīrāvayavinaḥ svāvayavasamavāyalakṣaṇā sthitiravayavavyatiṣaṅgaviśeṣādṛte na cetayitāraṃ paramapekṣate /
GSP33yaissi_u:259: na sā pakṣīkṛte kṣityādau sambhavatīti sthitimapi naikarūpāṃ pakṣasapakṣānuyāyinīmudīkṣāmahe /
GSP33yaissi_u:268: upādānādīnāṃ saṃvedī-sākṣātkartā yaścetanaḥ tena nimittahetunā kriyamāṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ ghaṭādikāryamityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:288: ādyaparispandasyādṛṣṭahetukatvaṃ ca kaṇādamuninā sūtritam 'agrerūrdhvajvalanaṃ vāyostiryakpavanamaṇūnāṃ manasaścādyaṃ karmādṛṣṭakāritam' iti
GSP33yaissi_u:294: prayojanasākṣātkartṛtvādi jīveṣi na sa bhavatīti kaimutikanyāyena sādhayituṃ svīyādṛṣṭāsākṣātkartṛtvamapi
GSP33yaissi_u:300: tathācanikhilārthasākṣātkāritvādyantarā kartṛḥ kṣityādeḥ sakartṛkatvarūpaḥ prakṛtārtho na sidhyatīti viśiṣṭakartṛlābho 'dhikaraṇasiddhāntanayeneti phalitam /
GSP33yaissi_u:311: ekacetanāyattatvaṃ jagato vikalpya dūṣayati 'kimasye' ti kārikayā /
GSP33yaissi_u:324: taccharīrādhīnopabhogopakārabhājāmanyeṣāṃ ca tatrādṛṣṭadvārā hetutvaṃ taddehina ivāstīti ekacetanāyattotpattisthitikatvaṃ dṛṣṭānte nāstītyarthaḥ
GSP33yaissi_u:325: dvitīye kalpe sthitiśabdārthavikalpanamukhena dūṣaṇāntaramapyāha 'api ce' ti/
GSP33yaissi_u:328: ārambhakasaṃyoge 'vayavasamavete dṛḍhe sati svāvayavasamavetatvalakṣaṇāvayavinaḥ sthitiḥ śarīrasya nirābādhā ghaṭāderiva prasidhyatyeveti
GSP33yaissi_u:331: cetanāpekṣā dṛṣṭānte vyāpakatvena sādhanasya gṛhītaivaṃvidhā sthitistu na pakṣe mahyādau /
GSP33yaissi_u:339: adhikaṃ nāma nigrahasthānaṃ ca prayuñjata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:340: yadyapi samavetadravyatvarūpe phalite hetau na vaiyarthya prasaktiḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:344: cetanādhīnatvameva tu sādhyata iti cettatrāha 'cetana' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:348: asmākamapi kāryasāmānyasya jīvādṛṣṭahetukatvena cetanādhīnatvasya sampratipatteḥ cetanādhīnatvamātrasādhane jīvaiḥ sdidhasādhanam /
GSP33yaissi_u:351: sākṣātkartuṃ kṣamante yatsarva eva ca cetanāḥ // 8 //
GSP33yaissi_u:352: adyavadeva viśvambharādayaḥ karmaprāptāgantukopacayāpacayaikadeśaśālino na yugapadeva niravaśeṣavilayajananabhāgina ityantimaparamāṇusākṣātkāro na kartṛbhāvopayogī /
GSP33yaissi_u:355: kartṛtvaṃ ca kṣityādau jīvānāṃ nasaṃbhavatīti cet ;
GSP33yaissi_u:364: vacanācca tadanugrahata evānuṣṭhāya tattatkarma yathāvidhi samadhigatasāmarthyaviśeṣā
GSP33yaissi_u:366: ca sākṣātkṛtyopādāya ca jagatsṛjeyuriti na kartrantarakalpanāvakāśa iti /
GSP33yaissi_u:371: na khalu kulālādayaḥ kumbhādikāryamārabhamāṇāstadupādānopakaraṇa- bhūtamṛddaṇḍacakrādikāryotpādanaśaktiṃ sākṣātkṛtya tattadārabhante /
GSP33yaissi_u:372: yadi paraṃ śaktimaviduṣāmabhilaṣitasādhane tadupādānādivyavahāro 'nupapannaḥ, iha tu-
GSP33yaissi_u:373: nanu pralaye pṛthvyāderādyadvyaṇukaṃ vināśājjīvānāṃ ca tadā karaṇakale varavidhuratvena
GSP33yaissi_u:376: kintu vartamāna iva kāle bhāgabhedenaiva tau kramaśaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:378: tathāca jīveṣveva keṣāñcitsādhanaviśeṣasamāsāditajñānaśaktyatiśayānāṃ hīnāṃśaprapūraṇātmakaṃ sarjanaṃ pṛthivyādyupādānasākṣātkārāditaḥ saṃbhavedeva viśvāmitrādīnāmivetyarthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:380: sāvaśeṣalaye tu jīvaviśeṣāṇāṃ tattadbhāgabhedakartṛtvaṃ saṃbhaviṣyatīti neśvarakalpanāvasara iti bhāvaḥ/
GSP33yaissi_u:383: tatsākṣātkāro na ca jīvānāṃ ghaṭata ityatrāha 'karmaṇaḥ' iti /
GSP33yaissi_u:395: api ca tadeva cetanakartṛkaṃ jagati paridṛśyate,
GSP33yaissi_u:397: na ca tathā mahīmahīdharamahārṇavādīti kathamiva tattatkāryatvam ?
GSP33yaissi_u:401: api cānīśvareṇa parimitaśaktijñānena vigrahavatānavāptakāmena kṛtamavagataṃ ghaṭādikāryamiti
GSP33yaissi_u:404: pramāṇāntaragocare hi liṅgini liṅgabalādāpatato viparītaviśeṣāṃstatpramāṇameva pratiruṇāddhi /
GSP33yaissi_u:405: iha punaratipatitasakalamānāntarakarmabhāve sarvanirmāṇanipuṇe siṣādhayiṣite yāvanto 'nvayavyatirekāvadhāritāvinābhāvabhājodharmāstānapyaviśeṣeṇopasthāpa yati /
GSP33yaissi_u:422: pralayasamaye pralīnasakalakaraṇakalevarādibhogopakaraṇatayā ca cetanānāṃ duḥkhābhāvāt duḥkhidarśanajanitakṛpāprayuktirapi nāstīti vyāpakabhūtasvārthakāruṇya
GSP33yaissi_u:445: viśiṣṭasādhyena gṛhītavyāptikaṃ ca śarīrādi viśiṣṭameva kartāraṃ sādhayet pakṣe /
GSP33yaissi_u:446: te cākārā abhimataviparītā iti viruddhavyāpyatvāddhetorviruddhatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:447: nanvevaṃ sapakṣe mahānasādau kārīṣatvādimatā vahninā gṛhītavyāptinā dhūmena pakṣe parvate kārīṣādivahnereva sādhanaṃ syāt /
GSP33yaissi_u:448: sa ca tatra nāstīti aprāmāṇyaprasaṅgo 'numānamātrasyetyatrāha 'nacaivam' iti /
GSP33yaissi_u:450: sādhyasya pramāṇāntaragrahyatve liṅgabalātprasaktānāṃ viruddhaviśeṣāṇāṃ pratyakṣādināpavadanāt vahnimātre prāmāṇyamanumānasyavyavasthāpyaṃ bhavennāma
GSP33yaissi_u:453: te kulālādyanugatā anīśvatvasaṃsāritvādayo bhavanti vyāpakatāvacchedakatvena gṛhītāḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:456: īśvarasya jatkartṛtvāsaṃbhavādapi niruktānumānamanīśvara eva viśrāmyatītyabhiprayannāha 'apace' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:459: svārthecchāyāḥ kāruṇyasya vā sattayā vyāpyaṃ buddimatpravṛttisāmānyamiti pūrvārdhasyārthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:460: siṣādhayiṣitasyeśvarasya tvavāptakāmatvānna svārthaḥ sādhanīyaḥ kaścana sambhavati sṛṣṭihetuḥ,
GSP33yaissi_u:470: pratyutaḥ duḥkhālayaṃ jagatsṛjato na kāruṇyaleśo 'pi ghaṭata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:472: athāpi sṛjyakarmāpekṣayā sarjanānna nairghṛṇyādiprasaṅga ityatrāha 'tatkarme' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:474: ūśāvaro yadi jagatkartā syādanavāptakāmatvādimān syāditi pratitarko 'trānusandheyaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:487: īśvaraḥ kartā na bhavati prayojanarahitatvādaśarīratvādvā muktātmavaditi /
GSP33yaissi_u:489: jñanādiviśeṣaguṇoparāgeṇaivātmanaḥ pratyakṣatvāt jñānārthapravṛttivelāyāṃ nātmano jñānopādānabhūtasvātmasākṣātkāritvaṃ niyamato 'sti /
GSP33yaissi_u:491: jñānārtha pravṛtterjñane kartṛtvaṃ samavāyitvaṃ ca paramasti /
GSP33yaissi_u:492: tathā copādānādyabhijñapūrvakatvābhāvavati jñānādai kāryatvasya sattvādvyabhicāra ityarthaḥ/
GSP33yaissi_u:495: kāmatvaśarīritvādiviparītākārakṣepakatvāt kṣityādau kartuḥ siṣādhayiṣitasya kāryatvasya viruddhatvam /
GSP33yaissi_u:501: evamasiddhyādidoṣaduṣṭatvātkāryatvasya tena kṣityādau upādanopakaraṇādisākṣātkartṛ kartṛpūrvakatvaṃ na sādhayituṃ śakyata ityarthaḥ // 13 //
GSP33yaissi_u:502: atra brūmo na kāryatvaṃ kṣityādau śakyanihnavam /
GSP33yaissi_u:506: na cedṛśa eva sanniveśaḥ kāryaḥ netara ityavayavasanniveśaviśeṣapratiniyataṃ rūpabhedamudīkṣāmahe /
GSP33yaissi_u:507: yattu śakyakriyaṃ śakyajñānopādānopakaraṇaṃ ca kriyata ita,
GSP33yaissi_u:510: te ca kṣityādiṣu yathoktasādhanabalasamupasthāpite iti na viśeṣaḥ
GSP33yaissi_u:512: nacaitāvāneva kriyāgocara iti viṣayaniyamaḥ kaścit kriyāya dṛṣṭaḥ ;
GSP33yaissi_u:538: na hi kiñcit kriyamāṇaṃ karturarthāntaraviṣayamasāmarthyamajñānāṃ vā svotpatte 'pekṣate ;
GSP33yaissi_u:546: na khalu kumbhakāraḥ kumbhātireki kimapi na vijānāti /
GSP33yaissi_u:559: adhitiṣṭhāsitadehasaṃyogavata eva tatpravṛttyanuguṇa prayatnayogalakṣaṇamadhiṣṭhānaṃ dṛṣṭamiti cet ;
GSP33yaissi_u:566: tenādhiṣṭhānakriyāpekṣitādhiṣṭheyapadārthasambhandhamātrātirekeṇa dehasambandho nāmaparo nādartavyaḥ asti ceśvarasyāpi jagadupādānopakaraṇaissambandha ityuktameva /
GSP33yaissi_u:568: dṛṣṭaṃ hi daṇḍacakrādiṣu karasaṃyogādinā kulālādeḥ pravartayitṛtvamityucyeta ;
GSP33yaissi_u:571: kathamasati śarīre parapreraṇātmakaḥ saṅkalpa iti cet ;
GSP33yaissi_u:585: īdṛśena kartrā ghaṭādiṣu kāryatvasya sambandho na dṛṣṭa iti cet ;
GSP33yaissi_u:586: atigahanagiritaṭādhiṣṭhānenātiprakṛṣṭādṛṣṭacarendhananivahasambandhinā hutavahaviśeṣeṇa mahānasādau dhūmasya vā kiṃ sambandho dṛṣṭaḥ ?
GSP33yaissi_u:588: yādṛśo dhūmo yatrāvagataḥ tatraiva tādṛśastatsampādanasamarthau dṛṣṭāntabhūmāvaparidṛṣṭo 'pi sāmānyavyāptibalena pakṣadhramatāvaśāt sidhyatītita cet ;
GSP33yaissi_u:590: imāpi kāryatvaṃ samarthakartṛpūrvakatvena ghaṭādiṣu viditasambandhaniyamaṃ kṣityādiṣu dṛśyamānaṃ svasampādanasamarthamadṛṣṭapūrvameva buddhimatkartāramupasthāpayati
GSP33yaissi_u:591: yathaiva hi deśakālendhanaparimāṇādiviśeṣānādareṇa dhūmasya svodayānuguṇahutavahamātreṇa sambndhaniyamaḥ,
GSP33yaissi_u:593: kāryasya svinirmāṇasamarkhabuddhimatkartṛmātreṇa sambandhaniyamaniścaya iti na kaścidviśeṣaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:594: api ca vibhudravyasaṃyoginaḥ parispandavataśca sarvatra sparśavattvāvyābhicāre 'pi jñānasukhādinityadravyaviśeṣaguṇānumitātmasaṃyogino manasaḥ kathamiva sparśarahitatvam ?
GSP33yaissi_u:595: kathaṃ na vāyavīyadravyasyamahimaguṇaśālino niyatādhiṣṭhānaspārśanatvaniyamadarśane 'pi tvagindriye tadviparyayaḥ ?
GSP33yaissi_u:596: taijasasya vā rūpasparśayoranyattarasya vā prākaṭyaniyame 'pi rūpopalambhasādhanatānumitataijasabhāsya cakṣuṣo niyamena tadubhayānudbhavābhyupagamaḥ
GSP33yaissi_u:597: atha kāryadarśanānumitasadbhāvānāṃ taijasādibhāve 'pi tattadviśeṣāṇāṃ yogyānupalabdhibādhitatvāt tadabhyupagame 'nekaniyamabhaṅgaprasaṅgācca
GSP33yaissi_u:598: hanta tarhi prakṛviṣaye 'pi prasaḍhañjitadharmaviśeṣāṇāmanupalambhabādhāviśeṣāt anekaniyamadarśanavighātaprasaṅgācca tathābhyupagama iti sarvaṃ samānamanyatrābhiniveśāt /
GSP33yaissi_u:608: kāryatvasya pakṣe kṣityādau asiddhisādhanāya prayoga uktaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:609: atha jīvaiḥ siddhasādhanatvasādhanārtha pralayanirāse prayoga ucyate 'vimatī' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:610: sati hi pralaye sargārambhesraṣṭṛtvaṃ jīvānāṃ karaṇādividhuratvānna ghaṭata iti kartrantaraṃ mantavyaṃ bhavet /
GSP33yaissi_u:619: evaṃ mīmāṃsakaidrūṣitameveśvarānumānaṃ tārkikaprakriyāmevāvalambya prāyaśo vyavaśthāpayitumupakramate doṣoddhāramukhena 'atra brūma'ityādinā
GSP33yaissi_u:625: paricchinnaparimāṇavattvarūpaṃ mūrtatvaṃ ca nityaparamāṇusādhāraṇamiti sāmānādhikaraṇyasambandhena mahattvaviśiṣṭaṃ taddetūkṛtam /
GSP33yaissi_u:627: tacac kevalaṃ nityaparamāṇvādisādhāraṇamiti bāhyapratyakṣaviṣayatvena viśeṣitaṃ taddhetūkṛtam /
GSP33yaissi_u:628: ātmano mānasapratyakṣatvātsāmānyaviśeṣavattvācca tatra vyabhicāra iti bāhyatvena pratyakṣaṃ viśeṣitam // 14 // 15 //
GSP33yaissi_u:634: kartāṃ vināpi kāraṇāntarata eva kṣityāderutpattisambhavādityatrāha 'na cedṛśa' iti /
GSP33yaissi_u:636: tacca puruśakṛtisādhyameva dṛṣṭamiti vicitrākārasya mahyaderapi sakartṛkatvameṣṭavyameva /
GSP33yaissi_u:638: sa ca viśeṣo na kṣoṇyādivyāvṛtta iti tasyāpi sakartṛkatvasiddhirapratihatā /
GSP33yaissi_u:640: kartṛtvāvacchinnasya kāraṇatvamastyeveti kāryatvameva sakartṛkatvavyāpyaṃ kṣityādau kartāraṃsamarthayatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:641: yadvā kṣityādi na kāryaṃ prasiddhakāryavilakṣaṇatvādityatrāprayojakatvamāha 'na cedṛśa' iti/
GSP33yaissi_u:644: kṛtijanyatve vā prayojakaṃ kṣoṇyādyākāravyāvṛttaṅghaṭādyākāramātravṛttidharmaviśeṣaṃ na paśyāma ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:646: anyathā tvaprayojakatvameva adṛṣṭakartṛko rājaprāsādo na kāryo daṣṭakartṛkaghaṭādikāryavilakṣaṇatvādityādivaditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:647: nanu śakyakriyatvādireva tādṛśoviśeṣaḥ kṣityādyākṛtivyāvṛtta iti cettatrāha 'yattu'iti /
GSP33yaissi_u:658: prāmāṇike ca kāryatve sati kāryatvasya viśiṣṭakartṛpūkatvavyāptibalāt kṣityādau kartṛviśeṣasiddhirapratyūhaiveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:663: evaṃ kāryatvaṃ kṣityādestataḥ sakartṛkatvaṃ ca sādhitam /
GSP33yaissi_u:664: atha sakartṛkatvānumānasya jīvaiḥ siddhasādhanatāṃ parihartuṃ kartṛtvesvarūpānupraviṣṭamadhiṣṭānādi vivṛṇoti 'adhiṣṭhāna' mityādinā /
GSP33yaissi_u:668: īśvarasannikarṣaḥ paramāṇvādau saṃyogarūpaḥ adṛṣṭe ca saṃyuktasamavāyarūpo vibhuddhayasaṃyogasyopagame /
GSP33yaissi_u:674: idaṃ puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vāsmin deśe kāle ca phalaṃ janayatvitīśvarasaṅkalpamūlādṛṣṭasya pravṛttiḥ
GSP33yaissi_u:679: nanu kartāramantaraiva kāraṇāntarataḥ kṣityādi bhavediti śaṅkāmantarnidhāya tatparihāramāha 'cetana'ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:681: tathā cādhiṣṭhātuḥ kārakacakraprayoktaḥ kartṛścetanasyāpekṣā kāryasāmānye 'syeveti kṣityādau sakartṛkatvaṃ nāpahnavārham /
GSP33yaissi_u:683: upādānadigocarāparokṣajñānamantarā ca tadadhiṣṭhānalakṣaṇasya kartṛtvasyāsambhavāt kṣityādikartṛḥ paramāṇvādisākṣātkāro 'pyāvaśyakaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:687: atrādhiṣṭhātṛtvarūpaṃ tat samarthyata iti parakṛtāsāṅgatyamiti śaṅkāyā nāvasara ityavadheyama /
GSP33yaissi_u:688: evaṃbhūtasya kṣityādikartṛtvasya sadā sarvadarśinaṃ sarvasamarthaṃ ceśvaraṃ vinānyatra jīveṣvasambhavānna taiḥ siddhasādhanamiti cātra vivakṣitam
GSP33yaissi_u:691: yatra yatra kārye na dṛṣṭaḥ kartā,
GSP33yaissi_u:700: kāryatvasya sattvādvyabhicāra ityapi sukhāderapi pakṣāntarbhāvata eva nirastamityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:702: nanu tarhi jīvasya svasukhādau kartṛtvaṃ na syāditi vācyam /
GSP33yaissi_u:705: adṛṣṭakāraṇādhiṣṭhānaṃ tu sarvatra kārye paramātmana eveti dhyeyam /
GSP33yaissi_u:706: nanvevamapi svajñānādyarthapravṛttipūrvakāle niyamena svasya sākṣātkārābhāvāt svajñānādyupādānabhūtasvātmasākṣātkartṛtvaṃ tadā tasya nāstīti cet, na, ātmanaḥ
GSP33yaissi_u:708: svajñānādau svasya kartṛtvasya svasmṛtimātreṇāpi abhyupagantavyatvādvā na doṣaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:709: upādānādisākṣātkartṛpūrvakatvamiti niyamastu īśvareṇaiva tatra tatra nirvāhyeti ca na vismartavyama /
GSP33yaissi_u:711: vyabhicāraṃ parihṛtya siddhasādhanatāṃ pariharati 'na cobhaye' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:723: 'tatsiddhe' riti pāṭhe tu śaktimadīśvarasyaiva vilakṣaṇapramāṇena siddherityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:727: sarvasyārthasya kriyākārakaphalavargāntaḥ pātitayā sarvādhiṣṭhānaṃ tadarthaṃ sarvasākṣātkaraṇamapīśvarasya prāpte /
GSP33yaissi_u:730: yatra kāryatvaṃ tatra tatra samarthakartṛjanyatvamiti vyāpterityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:735: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ-yenākareṇa kartuḥ kāraṇatvaṃ tadrūpāvacchinnakartṛpūrvakatvenaiva kāryatvasya ghaṭādau vyāptirgṛhītā /
GSP33yaissi_u:736: kiñcidviṣayājñānādimattvena ca na ghaṭādau kāraṇatvaṃ kulālādeḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:738: anyaviṣaye jñānājñāne śaktyaśaktī vā aprayojake prakṛtakāryotpāde /
GSP33yaissi_u:749: arthāntaraviṣayaśaktyādyabhāvasya vyatireke prakṛtakāryasya vyatireka iti vyatirekasahacārasyāsiddheriti vār'thaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:758: atha vikalpamukhenārthāntaraviṣayakājñānādeḥ niyatapūrvavṛttitvamapi pratikṣipati 'api ce' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:761: nanu prakṛtakāryātiriktakatipayaviṣayājñānādi karturiṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ cetyatrāha 'athe' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:763: yathā kaścitpaṭakāraḥ ghaṭaṃ na jānāti kaścittu jānāti,
GSP33yaissi_u:764: kaścittvanyanna jānāti anyastu tajjānātīti prakṛtakarturanyānyaviṣayaṃ jñānamajñānaṃ cāvyavasthitaṃ dṛśyate /
GSP33yaissi_u:765: paṭādyajñānaṃ ghaṭādyajñānaṃ vā niyataṃ karturdurvacamiti tattadajñānasya tatra tatrānaikāntyānna hetutvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:766: sarvasyāpi kartuḥ kiñcidvastu niyamena na jñāyate iti tu durvacamevetyāha 'na cāstī' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:770: tathā ca tattadajñānasya tatra tatra vyabhicāre 'pi niruktarūpāvacchinnajñānābhāvasya niyatapūrvavṛttitvasambhava eveti cet,
GSP33yaissi_u:775: ekaṃ dehaṃ parityajya dehāntaraparigrahaṇaṃ kurvato jīvasya tadā/
GSP33yaissi_u:777: yogino yogabalājjīvato dehāntaragrahaṇaṃ kurvato jīvasya tadāśarīritvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:778: yogino yogabalājjīvato dehāntaragrahaṇaṃ saśarīrasyaiva dṛṣṭamityayogina ityuktam /
GSP33yaissi_u:783: tathā ca kartuḥ śarīratvaniyame na vyabhicāra iti cet ;
GSP33yaissi_u:789: evaṃ śarīropādāne kartṛtvaṃ jīvasyā śarīrasyaiveti samarthya śarīrapreraṇe kartṛtvamapyaśarīrasyaivetyāha 'kiñce' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:793: adhiṣṭhānakarmībhūtasya kāṣṭhāde stacchettṛtāvacchedakatvaṃ yathā na tadvaditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:799: atyantato 'sambaddhasyādhiṣṭheyena tadadhiṣṭhātṛtvasya kāṣṭhāsaṃbaddhasya kuṭhārasya cchettṛtvasyevāsaṃbhavādadhiṣṭheyasambandhinādhiṣṭhātrā bhavitavyamityeva niyamaḥ,
GSP33yaissi_u:801: preraṇaṃ prati preryasambandha eva hetuḥ na dehasambandha ityatra niyāmakaṃ pṛcchati 'kuta' iti /
GSP33yaissi_u:814: tathā ca dehatadavayavabhinnavastupravartane dehahastādivyāpārāpekṣāsyeveti neśvarasyānākṛteḥ paramāṇvādyadhiṣṭhātṛtvaṃ saṃbhavatītyāśayaḥ śaṅkituḥ
GSP33yaissi_u:817: preryasaṃbandho 'pyatra prerakasya jñānadvāraka eveti ca bodhyam /
GSP33yaissi_u:822: yena yena tadabhāve saṅkalpo na ghaṭetetyarthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:826: tathā ca śarīrābhāve 'pi svahetoreva saṅkalpo bhaviṣyatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:827: nanu manasaḥ karaṇatve 'pi janyajñānādau dehasyāpyastyevāpekṣāvacchedakatayeti cedatra brūmaḥ-baddhajñānādāveva dehāpekṣā, nānyatra /
GSP33yaissi_u:828: 'manasaivaitān kāmān paśyan ramateya ete brahmaloke' 'manasaiva jagatsṛṣṭi'-mityādinā muktasyeśvarasya ca manovattvaṃ,
GSP33yaissi_u:831: īśvare nityajñānacikīrṣāprayatnavādināṃ tārkikāṇāṃ mate tu na tarāṃ śarīrādyapekṣā /
GSP33yaissi_u:832: atra manovattvāgantukasaṅkalpādisamarthanaṃ tu tadekadeśimatena vā siddhāntacchāyayā veti bodhyam /
GSP33yaissi_u:836: samarthakartṛpūrvakatvena kāryatvasya vyāptergṛhītatvāt tataḥ kṣityādau sidhyataḥ karturīśvarasyāśarīritvaiśvaryādyeva setsyati 'yakṣānurūpo bali' riti nyāyāt /
GSP33yaissi_u:843: sarīrābhāve 'pi prāyaṇāvāntaralayādau nityendriyatayā manasaḥ sattvātkālāvacchedena śarīravyāpyatvaṃ manaso nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:844: nanvevamapi saśarīrasyaiva kartṛtvaṃ tatra tatra dṛṣṭāmiti
GSP33yaissi_u:845: śarīrikartṛkatvena vyāptiḥ kāryatvasya kuto na gṛhyata ityatrāha 'yāvaddhī' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:846: dṛṣṭānuguṇaṃ kāryānugumatvena dṛṣṭamata eva vyāptyupayogi thadrūpaṃ tadavacchinnenaiva vyāptireṣṭavyā /
GSP33yaissi_u:856: akarmavaśyatvāśarīritvasarvajñatvādiviśiṣṭakartrā kāryatvasyāvinābhāvo ghaṭādau na dṛṣṭa iti śaṅkiturbhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:857: sāmānyadharmāvacchinnavyāptigrahādeva pakṣadharmatābalasahakārātpakṣīyasādhya viśeṣasiddhiriti hārdena pratibandīmāha 'atigahane' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:870: dhūmātparvate vahniviśeṣānumānāt kāryatvāt kṣityādau kartṛviśeṣānumānasya na vailakṣaṇyam /
GSP33yaissi_u:872: atha sapakṣadarśanamātreṇa sarvadharmāpādane pratibandī vivakṣurāha 'api ce' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:881: atrāyaṃ pratitarko vivakṣitaḥ-mano yadi paricchinnaparimāmavat syāt kriyāvadvā tarhi sparśavadbhavediti /
GSP33yaissi_u:885: yadyapi mahato vāyorgatiśīlasyāniyatādhiṣṭhānatvamudbhūtasparśavattvāt spārśanapratyakṣatvaṃ ca bhūyo dṛṣṭam /
GSP33yaissi_u:892: evaṃ rūpasparśaubhayatadanyatarodbhavasya bhūyo dṛṣṭatve 'pi cakṣuṣo rūpadiṣu rūpādiṣu
GSP33yaissi_u:894: cakṣuṣaḥ taijasamahatkaryatve rūpasparśānyatarodbhavaḥ syāditi prasaṅgo 'tra bodhyaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:908: tathā ca pratitarkāṇāṃ chinnamūlatvaṃ ca vivakṣitam /
GSP33yaissi_u:910: tulyanayena kratṛtve saśarīratvamiti niyamo 'pi nāstītyāśayavānāheśvaravādī 'hantatarhī' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:917: īśvarasya sa dharmo nitya evopeyata iti pakṣe ca dharmasāmānyasya vihitakriyājanyatvaniyamabhaṅgaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:926: īśvare 'pyabhimataviśeṣeṣu santi pramāṇānītyarthaḥ tānyeva prapañcayati 'yathā' iti /
GSP33yaissi_u:927: 'tathe' ti pāṭhe tu tathā hi nītayo dṛśyanta ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:939: paramāṇvādigocarāvīśvarasya saṅkalpaprayatnau prasādhya sākṣātkāramapi tādṛśaṃ sādhayati 'tathe' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:946: na caitatsākṣātkartṛtvaṃ jīvānāmiti na taiḥ siddhasādhanam /
GSP33yaissi_u:948: atha sākṣādevātīndriyārthān pakṣīkṛtya pratyakṣaviṣayatvaṃ sādhayati 'pratyakṣam' iti /
GSP33yaissi_u:977: yathākarma phalapradatvāt svāmitvamapi sarvasya tasmin pratitiṣṭhatyeva /
